snp1.12:9.5: Padmaṃva → padumaṃva (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed), alippamānaṃ → alimpamānaṃ (sya-all, mr)
snp1.12:12.2: Daharo majjhimo ca muni → daharo ca majjhimo ca munī (bj) | daharo ca majjho ca munī (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
snp1.12:12.3: na so roseti → so na roseti (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | na roseti (sya-all)
